title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: The Cuban Missile Crisis
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research     Bibliography     The Cuban Missile Crisis                  The Cuban Missile Crisis       Connery, Donald S. One Minute To Midnight: Kennedy, Khrushchev, and Castro on the Brink of Nuclear War. Vintage: 2009.  Fursenko, Aleksandr & Naftali, Timothy. One Hell of a Gamble: Khrushchev, Castro, and Kennedy, 1958-1964: The Secret History of the Cuban Missile Crisis. W.W. Norton & Company, 1999.  Kennedy, Robert F. Thirteen Days: A Memoir of the Cuban Missile Crisis. W.W. Norton & Company, 1999.  Munton, Don & Welch, David. The Cuban Missile Crisis: A Concise History. Oxford University Press, 2011.  Stern, Sheldon M. The Week the World Stood Still: Inside the Secret Cuban Missile Crisis. Stanford University Press, 2005.  Stern, Sheldon M. Stanford University Press, 2011.
